dokall.description: A communication and collaboration platform for businesses with workspace functionality, real-time messaging, voice/video calling, notes management, and task management.

res.res_003: Implemented Boards (task management) and Notes (content & note management) features.
res.res_004: Built the Admin Dashboard UI for user and system management.
res.res_005: Integrated the Draft Message feature for temporary text storage.
res.res_006: Ensured cross-browser and cross-device compatibility using responsive design techniques.
res.res_007: Tested UI, identified issues, fixed bugs, and optimized user experience.

scanart.description: A mobile application that allows users to scan artworks to retrieve information and enables buying/selling artworks through an integrated marketplace.

res.res_001: Developed UI for both mobile application (Flutter) and web-based Admin Dashboard.
res.res_002: Implemented mobile screens from design files, integrated APIs and processed artwork/user/transaction data.
res.res_003: Built and enhanced the Admin Dashboard for managing artworks, users and marketplace operations.
res.res_004: Updated and refined UI based on client requirements to meet product goals and user expectations.
res.res_005: Conducted UI testing on both mobile and web; detected issues, reported and fixed bugs before release.

storii.description: A personal web for a singer, featuring music playback, concert information, album showcase, and interview articles.
